entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Periods of light snow or ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
